original_text: During the war between the house of Saul and the house of David, Abner had been strengthening his own position in the house of Saul.
korean_text: 사울의 집과 다윗의 집 사이에 전쟁이 있는 동안에 아브넬이 사울의 집에서 점점 권세를 잡으니라

sentences.original_text: During the war between the house of Saul
Abner had been strengthening his own position
